title: Analysis of Feedback Effects in Online Instructional Design Processes: A Mixed-Methods Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and online learning environment experience
context.additional_context: Conducting project-based assessments for science sector managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners compare the strengths and weaknesses of various feedback types (text/video) and propose context-appropriate online instructional designs
Learners internalize methods for quantitatively analyzing feedback effectiveness using mixed research designs
Learners acquire skills to systematically interpret qualitative data through open-response analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
